This array contains the url's of the target files of the left menu items each target file must correspond exactly to the menu item The menu items are contained in an array. These items are language and therefore contained in the language table file. Sample: language/lang_en_indexframe.php To integrate a new module to the main structure of the CARE insert the filename of the module's starting script as an additional element of the following array.
